title: Princess Elizabeth's tour of Canada
brief_description: Documentary footage of Princess Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh on their royal tour of Canada and the United States in 1951. Includes glimpses of Montreal, Quebec, Calgary, Niagara Falls, and Washington as well as the Dionne quintuplets and Harry S. Truman.
